merchantIntegrations.title: Store Integrations
merchantIntegrations.subtitle: Connect your e-commerce store to sync products with Raff

toasts.connectedDescription: Your store is now synced with Raff.
toasts.registeredDescription: Your {platform} store has been connected. Your account is pending approval.

security.title: Secure OAuth Connection
security.description: When you connect your store, you'll be redirected to {platforms} to authorize Raff. We never see or store your store password.

items.authenticate: You authenticate directly on the platform's website
items.token: Raff only receives a secure access token
items.revoke: You can revoke access anytime from your store settings

zid.name: Zid
zid.description: Build and grow your online store

connect.title: How do I connect my store?
connect.description: Click the Connect button above. You'll be redirected to your platform's website to authorize the connection. After authorization, you'll be redirected back to Raff.

security.title: Is my data secure?
security.description: Yes. We use OAuth 2.0, the industry standard for secure authorization. We never see or store your store password. Only product and order data is synced.

disconnect.title: Can I disconnect my store?
disconnect.description: Yes. You can revoke access at any time from your store settings or by contacting Raff support.
